mathematica: q = 26; Join[{a = 1}, Table[a = (q - n)*a/(n + 1), {n, 0, q - 1}]] (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Jul 10 2011 *)Binomial[26,Range[0,26]] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Jun 02 2013 *)
